articles.author: Vishwanath Hariharan
articles.title: World Cup 2023: Michael Clarke blasts out at Pat Cummins and Co. after Australia's defeat against South Africa; issues warning - Cricket Times
articles.description: Former Australia captain Michael Clarke has lashed out at Australia after two consecutive losses in the ODI World Cup 2023. Clarke even issued a warning to the Aussie side ahead of their upcoming matches.
articles.content: Australia’s ODI World Cup 2023 campaign got off to a nightmarish start as the five-time champions suffered two consecutive losses in the early stages. The team, led by Pat Cummins, first faced defeat… [+2879 chars]
